SELECT oop.PROMOTION_TYPE AS promotionType,oo.SUBJECT_TYPE AS subjectType, oop.ONLINE_ID AS onlineId, oo.ONLINE_TITLE AS onlineTitle, oopc.PIC_PATH AS picPath, oos.ONLINE_SPEC AS onlineSpec, oos.SALE_PRICE AS salePrice, oos.CASHBACK_AMOUNT AS cashbackAmount, oos.ID AS specId FROM ONL_ONLINE_PROMOTION oop LEFT JOIN ONL_ONLINE oo ON oop.ONLINE_ID=oo.ID LEFT JOIN ONL_ONLINE_SPEC oos ON oop.ONLINE_ID = oos.ONLINE_ID AND oos.ONLINE_ID=oo.ID LEFT JOIN ONL_ONLINE_PIC oopc ON oop.ONLINE_ID=oopc.ONLINE_ID AND oopc.ONLINE_ID=oo.ID AND oopc.ONLINE_ID=oos.ONLINE_ID WHERE oop.PROMOTION_TYPE = #{promotionType,jdbcType=TINYINT} AND oos.ID = ( SELECT ID FROM ONL_ONLINE_SPEC WHERE ONLINE_ID=oop.ONLINE_ID and CURRENT_ONLINE_COUNT - SALE_COUNT > 0 and SALE_PRICE=( SELECT min(SALE_PRICE) FROM ONL_ONLINE_SPEC WHERE ONLINE_ID = oop.ONLINE_ID and CURRENT_ONLINE_COUNT - SALE_COUNT > 0 ) limit 1 ) AND oo.ONLINE_STATE=1 AND oopc.PIC_TYPE=1
